html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08042012-06-14,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectAgreements amending the Tax Collection Agreement with various provinces and territories
PrecisOrder approving that the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, enter into agreements to amend the TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENTS with the government of each of Ontario, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Manitoba, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Saskatchewan, Newfoundland and Labrador, Yukon and Nunavut in order to (1) adjust the schedule of provincial and territorial corporate income tax payments made by the federal government to the provinces and territories; (2) make minor changes of an editorial nature or to ensure consistency in wording between all the Agreements.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Agreements amending the Tax Collection Agreement with various provinces and territories
precis: Order approving that the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, enter into agreements to amend the TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENTS with the government of each of Ontario, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Manitoba, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Saskatchewan, Newfoundland and Labrador, Yukon and Nunavut in order to (1) adjust the schedule of provincial and territorial corporate income tax payments made by the federal government to the provinces and territories; (2) make minor changes of an editorial nature or to ensure consistency in wording between all the Agreements.
